value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Legendary Hero? I have no time to
consider what that means. Until I
defeat Surtr, I must stay focused!$k$p

$WmMPID_スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Normal,Face|$w0|A Legendary Hero, you say? What an
honor! Please, tell me the stories
you share about me in this world.$k$p

$WmMPID_伝承アイク,ch11_00_Ike_M_Legend01,Face|$w0|Legendary Hero? I don't know much
about history. If you're up for some
training, I'll spar with you, though.$k$p

$WmMPID_伝承エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Legend01,Face|$w0|Legendary Hero? I'm not worthy of
the title. I'm always up for testing my
skills, though. Let's see who's better!$k$p

$WmMPID_伝承リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Legend01,Face|$w0|A Legendary Hero...perhaps one day.
I shall continue to hone my skills by
training day in and day out.$k$p
